definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Star Wars are closely linked to conventional ground-combat.
sentences.chinese: 星球大战与地面常规作战之间有着密切的联系。

sentences.english: Fett was one of the best Star Wars character.
sentences.chinese: 我一直以为波巴费特是最佳的星球大战人物之一。

sentences.english: “In Stars Wars, the Death Star died twice, ” Willard continued.
sentences.chinese: 他接着说在《星球大战》中，死亡之星死了两次。

sentences.english: I really want to watch "star wars" on the opening day.
sentences.chinese: 我真的很想在首映那天看“星球大战”。

sentences.english: Star Wars themed alarm clock will project the time on your wall.
sentences.chinese: 这款星球大战主题闹钟会把时间投影到你的墙上。

sentences.english: Costuming difficulties resulted in a piece of trivia about Star Wars.
sentences.chinese: 《星球大战》中的戏服带来了一点小小的麻烦。

sentences.english: LEGO Minifig alarm clocks shaped like Star Wars characters.
sentences.chinese: 乐高按照星球大战人物造型制作的人仔闹钟。

sentences.english: Star Wars is one of the greatest movies ever.
sentences.chinese: 星球大战是永远是最伟大的电影之一。

sentences.english: When it comes to books they want to read, Star Wars titles top the list.
sentences.chinese: 当涉及到他们想要的阅读书籍，星球大战列居首位。

sentences.english: Can't wait for Star Wars in 3-D?
And then the following summer, they re-released Star Wars.
sentences.chinese: 然后在第二年夏天，他们重映了《星球大战》。

sentences.english: He hasn't directed a non-Star Wars movie since.
sentences.chinese: 从此，他也没有导演过任何一部非星球大战的影片。

sentences.english: You crocheted Star Trek communicators for the whole family.
sentences.chinese: 你给全家每人都用钩针编织了一个星球大战发报机。

sentences.english: He's talking about the US bundles with Daxter and Star Wars Battlefront .
sentences.chinese: 他在谈到美国与捆绑游戏和星球大战前线。

sentences.english: The 501st focuses on Star Wars villain costuming.
sentences.chinese: 五零一集中与星球大战的反派扮装。

sentences.english: Star Wars was thefilm he should have made.
sentences.chinese: 《星球大战》应该是他的作品才对。

definition: Harry Potter, boy wizard in the novels by J.K. Rowling 羅琳|罗琳
The Lord of the Rings by J.R.R. Tolkien 托爾金|托尔金[Tuo1 er3 jin1]
